languageSpecifications.howtogetsupporttext: How to get support anonymous? click 'Add support contact' and the support contact will be added to your contact list. Send like a normal message 'the key is set automatic' so support can read and answer to the message. if you done you can remove the support contact from your list. Support will never send you message only will reply!
languageSpecifications.howtogetsupportalert:
SUPPORT ADDED SUCCESSFULLY
Now you can chat secure with us if you have some bugs - tips or else. Whene you don't want SUPPORT anymore you can delete the contact to swipe from right to left.
languageSpecifications.testaccountadded:
TEST UID ADDED SUCCESSFULLY
Now you can send message and use your oun key the server will automatic send you the message back so you can try to use a other key and see if you still can read the message.
languageSpecifications.oepsaerror: Oops, a Error. We missing something important. please try again.
languageSpecifications.txt_set_main_password: Set your password. It must contain at least 14 characters a capital and special character.
languageSpecifications.swiper-txt-1:
EVERY USER HAS A UNIQUE ID.

IF YOU WANT TO ADD A CONTACT, YOU NEED HIS/HER UNIQUE ID.
languageSpecifications.swiper-txt-2: NEXT STEP IS TO DEFINE A UNIQUE SECRET KEY WITH YOUR CONTACT AND USE IT TO ENCRYPT YOUR MESSAGE.
languageSpecifications.swiper-txt-3:
THE CONTACTS YOU ARE SENDING
MESSAGE TO, NEED TO KNOW THIS
KEY TO DECRYPT THE MESSAGES.
languageSpecifications.swiper-txt-4:
START YOUR CONVERSATION
BY CLICKING ON A
CONTACT’S NICKNAME
IN YOUR CONTACTSLIST.
languageSpecifications.swiper-txt-5:
PEM is the best secured personal messaging app available for your smartphone. Designed and coded to send confidential messages really confidential. PEM does so with a so-called double encryption. In addition to the app-generated encryption you can also add a personal encryption which you agree with your contact. This combination ensures the best possible encryption of messages at this time.
PEM is 100% anonymous.
languageSpecifications.setup_txt_logoff_timer: This app will log off the app automatically is no action has been registered after:
languageSpecifications.setup_txt_set_burn_password: PEM also uses a burn password. Using this password will erase all contacts and conversations. This cannot be undone.
languageSpecifications.importent:
*** IMPORTANT ***
THIS MESSAGE WILL ONLY SHOW ONCE!
languageSpecifications.done3:
and keep it somewhere safe.
You'll need there for reinstall or using PEM on another device.
languageSpecifications.done4Lite:
Now you are ready to use PEM.

Your account is Lite.
You can communicate with one other contact.

For more contacts you need
top upgrade to PEM Pro.

More details: http://pem.world
languageSpecifications.done4Pro:
Now you are ready to use PEM.

Your account is PRO.
You can communicate with infinite contact also using PEM.

More details: http://pem.world
languageSpecifications.done4Primium:
Now you are ready to use PEM.

Your account is Premium. You can communicate with infinite contact also using PEM.

More details: http://pem.world
languageSpecifications.secret_key_to_encrypt_your_messages: Secret key to encrypt your messages
languageSpecifications.HELP_CONTACTS_TXT: You can add contacts bij pressing ‘ADD CONTACT’ in the upper right of your screen.If you want to send a message to one of your contacts, press the contact.Swipe contact to the right: check user ID.Swipe contact to the left: you can edit contact’s nickname, set your secret key or delete the contact. secret key is not set (THE SAVE WAY) secret key is set and remembered (automatic decrypt but less safe)
languageSpecifications.HELP_MESSAGES_SEND_TXT: Write your message in the messagebar and press to send it. If no personal secretkey is stored PEM ask you for the secretkey to use with this contact. Use to make one secure photo, this action have no access to your device and won't store/save anything!
languageSpecifications.HELP_MESSAGES_SEND_NEW_TXT: Write your message in the messagebar and press to send it. If no personal secretkey is stored PEM ask you for the secretkey to use with this contact. Use to make one secure photo, this action have no access to your device and won't store/save anything!
languageSpecifications.HELP_SETTINGS_TXT: Make a choose to change different settings like, Notifications, Log-Off Timer, Log-Off Shake, Main / Burn Password reset, or you language. You can add a contact by scanning his QR code with your camera.
languageSpecifications.txt_notification:
Choose which notifications
you want to receive.
languageSpecifications.txt_logoff_timer: The app will stop automatically if not active within the set time. Any conversation in concept will be erased after logging out.
languageSpecifications.txt_shake_logoff: Shake your device and the app will stop immediately. After restarting the app changes will be processed.
